title: Blessed dragonhide armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Blessed dragonhide armour is a type of Ranged armour. Players need level 70 Ranged to equip the respective chaps and vambraces. Players need level 70 Ranged and level 40 Defence to wear the rest of the armour set. This armour cannot be made using the Crafting skill; players can only obtain it from hard Treasure Trails or through purchase from other players. Each piece of blessed dragonhide armour has better defensive stats and the same offensive stats as its corresponding black dragonhide armour piece, plus a +1 Prayer bonus. Unlike black dragonhide armour, coif and boots are also available.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Blessed dragonhide armour

Blessed dragonhide armour is a type of Ranged armour. Players need level 70 Ranged to equip the respective chaps and vambraces. Players need level 70 Ranged and level 40 Defence to wear the rest of the armour set. This armour cannot be made using the Crafting skill; players can only obtain it from hard Treasure Trails or through purchase from other players. Each piece of blessed dragonhide armour has better defensive stats and the same offensive stats as its corresponding black dragonhide armour piece, plus a +1 Prayer bonus. Unlike black dragonhide armour, coif and boots are also available.

Blessed dragonhide armour is available in 6 variants, one for each of the gods: Guthix, Saradomin, Zamorak, Armadyl, Bandos, and Ancient. Wearing any piece of Saradomin, Zamorak, Armadyl or Bandos blessed d'hide armour will make the affiliated faction unaggressive within the God Wars Dungeon and the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.

Contents

  • 1 Components and bonuses
  • 2 Items
    • 2.1 Ancient
    • 2.2 Armadyl
    • 2.3 Bandos
    • 2.4 Guthix
    • 2.5 Saradomin
    • 2.6 Zamorak
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 See also

Components and bonuses[edit | edit source]

All the blessed dragonhide armours have the same stats.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

God dragonhide chaps and vambraces no longer have a 40 Defence requirement, to match their normal black dragonhide counterparts.

30 October 2014
(update)

God dragonhide armour is now listed in the Ranged skill guide.

27 March 2014
(update | poll)

Blessed Dragonhide Armour now gives a +1 prayer bonus per piece.
